name: Manchester United Player Nicknames Quiz | Sports | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Sparky.

	As of March 2002, Hughes plays for Premiership Blackburn Rovers and is the Manager of the Welsh national team.

Juan Sebastian Veron.

	Veron was signed from Lazio in 2001 for 28.1 million.

captain marvel.

	Robson's nickname came from his leadership and bravery.

George Best.

	Best was given the nickname by the Portuguese press after a European Cup match against Benfica in 1966.

questions.text: Brian McClair also had a nickname. What was it?
questions.explanation:
Choccy.

	McClair scored the only goal of the game in the 1992 League Cup final.

joe jordan & jordan.

	Joe Jordan's lack of front teeth and his physical presence was the reason for this nickname.

questions.text: Ray Wilkins. What was his nickname?
questions.explanation:
Butch.

	Wilkins captained Chelsea at the age of 18, and played 84 times for England.

questions.text: I was known as 'The Great Dane'. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Peter Schmeichel.

	Schmeichel captained United to victory in the 1999 European Cup Final, in the absence of the suspended Roy Keane.

norman whiteside & whiteside.

	Whiteside retired from football at the age of 26 because of a knee injury.

questions.text: 'Dolly and Daisy'. One was Gary Pallister, who was the other?
questions.explanation:
Steve Bruce.

	After they retired, Steve Bruce became manager of Birmingham City, and  Gary Pallister appeared on Sky Sports.
